title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with modern UI and robust backend
longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with Next.js, featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, payment integration, and admin dashboard. The platform includes advanced features like real-time inventory tracking, order management, and analytics.

title: AI-Powered Task Manager
description: Smart task management app with AI-driven priority suggestions
longDescription: An intelligent task management application that uses machine learning to analyze user behavior and suggest optimal task priorities. Features include natural language task creation, smart scheduling, productivity analytics, and team collaboration tools.

title: Real-time Chat Application
description: Scalable chat app with video calling and file sharing
longDescription: A modern real-time chat application supporting text messaging, voice/video calls, file sharing, and group conversations. Built with WebRTC for peer-to-peer communication and Socket.io for real-time messaging. Features end-to-end encryption and message history.

title: DevOps Monitoring Dashboard
description: Comprehensive monitoring solution for microservices architecture
longDescription: A centralized monitoring dashboard for tracking the health and performance of microservices. Includes real-time metrics, alerting system, log aggregation, and automated incident response. Built with modern DevOps practices and containerized deployment.

title: Machine Learning Model Trainer
description: No-code platform for training and deploying ML models
longDescription: A user-friendly platform that allows non-technical users to train, evaluate, and deploy machine learning models without writing code. Features drag-and-drop interface, automated feature engineering, model comparison, and one-click deployment to cloud services.

title: Design System Library
description: Comprehensive UI component library with design tokens
longDescription: A complete design system and component library built for scalable applications. Includes reusable components, design tokens, accessibility guidelines, and comprehensive documentation. Supports multiple frameworks and theming capabilities.
